body:
In general we don't pay attention to comments that only say "+1". In fact,
I think we have a bot that deletes them.

What would be very useful instead would be pointers to programs (ideally
self-contained ones on play.golang.org) illustrating what you are trying to
do with encoding/xml, what output you wish you were getting, and how the
current output differs/breaks your use case. That information would help
guide any eventual fixes we make here.

Thanks.
